title: Partial Droppers of PESU
content: How was jee? how was ESA? What do you plan in sem 2? (I am not a partial Droppers just curious) Tell your success or failure stories here

comments.body: JEE and esa came on same day so i gave up on partial drop
You still have April attempt right? Or did u give up completely?
I think that isa of sem 2 will be there in April, which means no use of partial drop
Why would you give up IIT Bangalore for any other IIT? /s
iit Bombay, bits goa and pilani yes
Delusional if you think any of them are better than IIT BLR
lol its about perspective and choices, i siad mine :)

Lmao, guess you're new here. 

Might want to check if there actually is an IIT Bangalore :)

<! The joke is that we call ourselves IIT BLR <!
